title: Rebirth of Spoiled Crown Princess - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Medical Knowledge   Reincarnation   Revenge   Royalty   Second Chance
author: 端木初初
description:
In the general’s house, the eldest daughter is born again.

In the last life, she mistakenly regarded the fish as a pearl and misunderstood the wolf.

In this world, she wants to expose the stepmother’s Buddha-snake heart and tear the sister’s hypocritical face.

This life, let me see how she protects her parents, keeps younger brothers, fights stepmothers and step on stepsisters.

Who will harm/betray her, she will return back a hundred times more, conspiracy against conspiracy to eliminate all! I want to stay away from the royal family, never want to become the imperial concubine, yet unexpectedly I can't escape from his love net!>
